title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Skills: Technology-Integrated Instructional Design for Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can create lesson plans utilizing at least three digital tools (e.g., virtual lab platforms, data visualization tools) tailored to science curriculum characteristics.
Analyze educational decision factors (learning objectives, assessment methods, interaction design, etc.) in technology integration through a three-step process.
Develop a technology-integrated lesson plan reflecting peer feedback and achieve at least 85% completeness during peer evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
